body:
Lol, on this post you need to write your wierdest thing happned you, not have to be im minecraft. Good luck c:
I'm gonna start.
( True story ): One time player asked me what's the IP of avicus, i said the old Ip: mc-hg.org ( That's the ip...)
Then, i got perm banned for the following reason: Advertising ( Picture ). Ok wtf then i appealed anf got unbanned after 5 dayz .-.
Write your funny and wierd stuff below :D
body_tagged:

title: Wierdest thing you ever had.

replies.body: I got banned for saying the server ip of a server once :Pit wasn't the old one ar anything either XD im still a bit salty tho cuz it was a great walls serverbutI found this server becuz of that :D so that made everything better :P :)
replies.body_tagged: I got banned for saying the server ip of a server once :Pit wasn't the old one ar anything either XD im still a bit salty tho cuz it was a great walls serverbutI found this server becuz of that :D so that made everything better :P :)

replies.body:
1- All my family died on a jet (my father's jet) in 2011 (My uncle, bother, 2 sisters and my best friend in that moment) 
2- I lost my best friend, and my girlfriend left me today in the morning :(
3- I lose my apple mac book pro (it costed $22.000 pesos= 2.560 dollars)
and my mum was so angry with me.... :(
4- My 3 favourite and life best dogs died the same day, (ray cause)

replies.body:
That's true
Lucky that I or my father or my mum
was in that jet :(
The dead's were caused by fire, :(
But okay. It happened 3 years ago....
I'm fine now, but when I remember it, I cry sometimes :'-(
:( . R.I.P. Uncle, bothers, and best friend 2.
